ajaxbrowser.ajaxbrowser module¶

Interface to run the ajax browser

class ajaxbrowser.ajaxbrowser.AjaxBrowser(**argv)[source]¶

Bases: ajaxbrowser.webkit.Browser

Extend webkit.Browser to add some specific functionality for abstracting AJAX requests

find_transitions(examples)[source]¶

Find transitions that have the example data we are after at the same JSON path

finished(reply)[source]¶

Override the reply finished signal to check the result of each request

run_models(models)[source]¶

Recieves a list of potential models for the execution. Executes them in order, shortest first, until find one that successfully executes.
